quotes.quote: You could consider a new beginning as the start of a new year. A fresh start, a new goal, a year to make your dreams come true. Be determined and persevere.
The beginning is the most important part of the work.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Do not despise humble beginnings. The Son of God began His life in a humble manger.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
All beginnings are delightful; the threshold is the place to pause.
Every beginning is difficult, but it gets easier from there on.
Every beginning is a consequence every beginning ends some thing.
All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time.
New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
A beginning is the end of something, always.
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
The beginning is always today.
Truth is the beginning of every good to the gods, and of every good to man.
A beginning is that which does not itself follow anything by causal necessity, but after which something naturally is or comes to be.
It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
Great beginnings are not as important as the way one finishes.
The beginning of atonement is the sense of its necessity.

Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over gain, and you will grow stronger until have accomplished a purpose not the one you began with perhaps, but one you'll be glad to remember.
What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from.
To see and listen to the wicked is already the beginning of wickedness.
Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
A beginning is the time for taking the most delicate care that the balances are correct.
Beginnings are apt to be shadowy and so it is the beginnings of the great mother life, the sea.
Begin at the beginning and go on till you come to the end; then stop.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth not going all the way, and not starting.
Before any beginning, there needs to be a plan of how you are going to get to the end. If you do not create a plan, it is like deciding to play football without the ball.
There will come a time when you believe everything is finished. That will be the beginning.
Beginning to think is beginning to be undermined.
He who chooses the beginning of a road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determine the end.
Beginnings are usually scary and endings are usually sad, but it's everything in between that makes it all worth living.
